relevant_findings.head: Normocephalic and atraumatic
relevant_findings.color: Pink with a 2 s capillary refill time
relevant_findings.cardiac: Normal rate and rhythm without murmurs, 3+ peripheral pulses
relevant_findings.respiratory: Clear and equal breath sounds with good air entry
relevant_findings.abdomen: Mildly distended, slightly tender to palpation, hypoactive bowel sounds, skin without erythema or cellulitis
